title: Unable to set constant with errors.New()
body:
1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
`go version go1.6 darwin/amd64`

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
`GOARCH="amd64"
GOBIN=""
GOEXE=""
GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
GOHOSTOS="darwin"
GOOS="darwin"
GOPATH="/Users/henrysnopek/go"
GORACE=""
GOROOT="/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.6/libexec"
GOTOOLDIR="/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.6/libexec/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64"
GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT="1"
CC="clang"
GOGCCFLAGS="-fPIC -m64 -pthread -fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments -fmessage-length=0 -fno-common"
CXX="clang++"
CGO_ENABLED="1"
`

3. What did you do?
https://play.golang.org/p/4UYQnL1rBc

4. What did you expect to see?
Ability to have set a constant with `errors.New()`

5. What did you see instead?
`errors.New()` is not a constant
